title: Let Help In Saving Millions of Babies with Man's Blood
body:

The blood contains an extraordinary antibody that's used to make a remedy known as anti-D immunoglobulin, additionally called Rh immunoglobulin. This remedy is given to mothers who're at hazard for something known as "Rh incompatibility" with their fetus, because of this the moms' **[immune system]** might also attack and damage the fetus's crimson blood cells.

title: Marijuana/ Cannabis plants deserve more scientific scrutiny...
body:
The report, released January 12 via the National Academies of Sciences, Engineering and Medicine in Washington, D.C., requires expanding research on capacity clinical applications of cannabis and its products, such as marijuana and chemical additives called cannabinoids.
Big gaps in know-how continue to be approximately health effects of cannabis use, for exact or sick. Efforts to have a look at those effects are hampered with the aid of federal class of cannabis as a Schedule 1 drug, which means it has no customary scientific use and a high ability for abuse. Schedule 1 reputation makes it hard for researchers to get entry to cannabis.
“The legalization and commercialization of cannabis has allowed advertising to get beforehand of technological know-how,” says Raul Gonzalez, a psychologist at Florida International University in Miami who reviewed the document before publication.
